abstract: Tianjin University in China defends three of its professors, who are among six Chinese scientists indicted by United States Justice Dept for economic espionage and theft of trade secrets.
lead_paragraph: Tianjin University, where three of six indicted scientists worked, defended its professors’ ethics and denied that it had benefited from any theft.

headline.main: Chinese University Denies Its Professors Stole U.S. Trade Secrets
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: University Defends Professors

snippet: Tianjin University, where three of six indicted scientists worked, defended its professors’ ethics and denied that it had benefited from any theft.
